name: @bNTWC skins port
descriptionShort: Not official port of skins from NTWC.
description: Not official port of skins from Nuclear Throne World Cup mod. Mod by TheRealHello, page: https://therealhello.itch.io/nuclear-throne-world-cup-skins-depository. Adds skins for all characters except Steroids, Rogue and secret characters
